hyp: In Thailand we do not eat only scorpion but we also eat many kind of insects such as bamboo worm, cricket, and grass hopper., I could not stand just stare at it, while on the other part of the world could eat it on the sticks just like a hotdog., It was hard to tell if it is actually a ‘normal food’ or a ‘exotic food’ in the big city like Beijing., I didnt see people eating cooked scorpions until I went to Beijing... which is a bit unexpected., In fact, the United States has only one type of scorpion that is considered deadly to humans., I just had Mcdonalds yesterday and studies have proven it to be more dangerous than scorpions. I tried eating one in Wangfujing street, Beijing., It’s very easy to find on market and food street., It was quite expensive, 30 RMB ($4.36) for a big scorpion.
ref: Scorpion is dangerous animal because of its venom. But, scorpion become foods in many countries in Asia. China is a well known country that consume scorpion. Fried scorpion commonly found at food streets in Beijing. Chinese medicine use scorpions and scorpion parts in healing such as skin conditions, cure infections. Apart from scorpion, many kinds of insect like bamboo worm, cricket, and grass hopper are also commonly eaten by some   asian countries like Thailand.

I tried eating one in Wangfujing street, Beijing., It’s very easy to find on market and food street., It was quite expensive, 30 RMB ($4.36) for a big scorpion., Fried insects can be a very good snack and it is addictive., The taste was unique, not in a good way, to be honest., People usually add salt and soy sauce on them., I just really want to taste it right now., Scorpion!
